column4: sometimes my network connection acts very strangely: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/152013/reports/network-sawtooth.png. I'm sure it's from me (my computer, or ISP) because it happens with different servers. Does any of you have an idea?
verstrange, i'd run ntop and see what's what
I'm installing ntop right now. Do I need to pass any option? What should I have a look at?
its like top, but for network traffic, just run it and watch. you may also want to run: dmesg | tail    to see any kernel messages recently
